item.title: Habits & Willpower
item.description: A common struggle in my life (and many other peoples) can be to find the motivation to get those unattractive tasks done. To combat this, I spend time trying to find methods and ideas on how to handle procrastination (mind you, sometimes we do our best thinking while procrastination so it isn’t always bad.) 5 second rule 5 minute rule 2 minute rule 40 percent rule Atomic Habits Eat the frog Habit Substitution Premack’s principle The Three R’s of Habit Change

item.title: List of Topics
item.description: This page serves as a central point to all my “maps” of various topics. Studying Note taking Habits and Willpower
